parameter.name: expirationPolicy
parameter.description: Configures the minimum amount of time that a dynamic configuration instance can remain idle before the runtime considers it eligible for expiration. This does not mean that the platform will expire the instance at the exact moment that it becomes eligible. The runtime will actually purge the instances when it sees it fit.

parameter.name: expirationPolicy
parameter.description: Configures the minimum amount of time that a dynamic configuration instance can remain idle before the runtime considers it eligible for expiration. This does not mean that the platform will expire the instance at the exact moment that it becomes eligible. The runtime will actually purge the instances when it sees it fit.

parameter.name: oktaUsername
parameter.description: Username that you want to login with against Okta Identity Provider.

parameter.name: oktaPassword
parameter.description: Password for the user that you are going to login against Okta Identity Provider.

parameter.name: oktaDomain
parameter.description: Domain name for Okta Identity Provider.

parameter.name: disableCnCheck
parameter.description:
When dealing with HTTPS certificates, if the certificate is not signed by a trusted partner, the server might respond with an Exception.

To prevent this it is possible to disable the CN (Common Name) check.

Note: this is not recommended for production environments.

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: Hostname for the proxy server.

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: Port number for the proxy server.

parameter.name: username
parameter.description: Username to be used in authentication against the proxy server.

parameter.name: password
parameter.description: Password for the username to be used in authentication against the proxy server.

parameter.name: ntlmDomain
parameter.description: The domain to authenticate against the proxy.

parameter.name: reconnection
parameter.description: When the application is deployed, a connectivity test is performed on all connectors. If set to true, deployment will fail if the test doesn't pass after exhausting the associated reconnection strategy

parameter.name: onlineUsername
parameter.description: Username that you want to login with. Domain should not be included.

parameter.name: onlinePassword
parameter.description: Password for the user that you are going to login.

parameter.name: siteUrl
parameter.description: URL for the sharepoint instance that the connector is going to interact with.

parameter.name: disableCnCheck
parameter.description:
When dealing with HTTPS certificates, if the certificate is not signed by a trusted partner, the server might respond with an Exception.

To prevent this it is possible to disable the CN (Common Name) check.

Note: this is not recommended for production environments.

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: Hostname for the proxy server.

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: Port number for the proxy server.

parameter.name: username
parameter.description: Username to be used in authentication against the proxy server.

parameter.name: password
parameter.description: Password for the username to be used in authentication against the proxy server.

parameter.name: ntlmDomain
parameter.description: The domain to authenticate against the proxy.

parameter.name: reconnection
parameter.description: When the application is deployed, a connectivity test is performed on all connectors. If set to true, deployment will fail if the test doesn't pass after exhausting the associated reconnection strategy

connection.name: security-token
connection.description: Deprecated the SecurityTokenConnectionStrategy Connection Provider because the BasicConnectionProvider already obtains the security token by itself

parameter.name: siteUrl
parameter.description: URL for the sharepoint instance that the connector is going to interact with.

parameter.name: disableCnCheck
parameter.description:
When dealing with HTTPS certificates, if the certificate is not signed by a trusted partner, the server might respond with an Exception.

To prevent this it is possible to disable the CN (Common Name) check.

Note: this is not recommended for production environments.

parameter.name: host
parameter.description: Hostname for the proxy server.

parameter.name: port
parameter.description: Port number for the proxy server.

parameter.name: username

parameter.name: reconnection
parameter.description: When the application is deployed, a connectivity test is performed on all connectors. If set to true, deployment will fail if the test doesn't pass after exhausting the associated reconnection strategy

parameter.name: claimsUsername
parameter.description: Username that you want to login with. Domain should not be included.

parameter.name: claimsPassword
parameter.description: Password for the user that you are going to login.

parameter.name: siteUrl
parameter.description: URL for the sharepoint instance that the connector is going to interact with.

parameter.name: stsUrl
parameter.description: Security Token Service URL to use for claims authentication

parameter.name: scope
parameter.description: Application Identifier configured for this Sharepoint Site in the Sts (a.k.a. 'Relying Party Identifier', 'Client Identifier', 'Scope' or 'Realm').

parameter.name: disableCnCheck
parameter.description:
When dealing with HTTPS certificates, if the certificate is not signed by a trusted partner, the server might respond with an Exception.

To prevent this it is possible to disable the CN (Common Name) check.

Note: this is not recommended for production environments.

operation.name: attachFile
operation.description: Attach a File to an item from a Sharepoint list

parameter.name: listTitle
parameter.description: (Mandatory) Title of the list the item belongs to

parameter.name: itemId
parameter.description: The ID of the list item.

parameter.name: fileName
parameter.description: The name of the file.

parameter.name: content
parameter.description: The file content represented as a stream. The stream and file name must be given if localFilePath is empty

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: fileAdd
operation.description: Adds a file.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.description: Deletes a file.

operation.name: folderCreate
operation.description: Creates a folder in a Document list

parameter.name: url
parameter.description: (Mandatory) Server relative URL of the folder to create, e.g. /Shared Documents/new folder, creates a folder in the 'Shared Documents' list

parameter.name: welcomePage
parameter.description: (Optional) Welcome page property of the folder, e.g. index.html

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: folderDelete
operation.description: Deletes a folder from a Document list

parameter.name: url
parameter.description: (Mandatory) Server relative URL of the folder to delete, e.g. /Shared Documents/new folder, deletes 'new folder' from 'Shared Documents' list

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: folderQuery
operation.description: Retrieves all folders that matches the specified criteria

parameter.name: query
parameter.description: (Mandatory) OData query in the format listDocumentName?queryString, e.g Shared Documents?$select=Name&$filter Name e.g. 'folderName'

parameter.name: startingFolderPath
parameter.description: (Optional) The starting path of the folder from where to begin the query, relative to the document library selected as part of the query below, e.g. /myfolder/level2 search for folders inside /document library/myfolder/level2. [Note: you must specify the document library as part of the query below]

parameter.name: recursive
parameter.description: Specifies whether to search recursively in inner folders

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: getMetadata
operation.description: Gets the metadata of a determined file.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: listCreate
operation.description: Creates a new SharepointList

parameter.name: list
parameter.description: (Mandatory) Sharepoint List reference to create

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: listDelete
operation.description: Deletes a Sharepoint list

parameter.name: listId
parameter.description: (Mandatory) Id of the list to delete

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: listGet
operation.description: Retrieves a Sharepoint list

parameter.name: listId
parameter.description: (Mandatory) Id of the list to retrieve

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: listGetAll
operation.description: Retrieves all Sharepoint lists

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: listItemCreate
operation.description: Creates a new Item in an existing Sharepoint list

parameter.name: listId
parameter.description: (Mandatory) Id of the list where to create the Item

parameter.name: properties
parameter.description: (Mandatory) Properties of the item to create

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: listItemDelete
operation.description: Deletes an Item from a Sharepoint list

parameter.name: listId
parameter.description: (Mandatory) Id of the list where to delete the Item

parameter.name: itemId
parameter.description: (Mandatory) Id of the item to delete

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: listItemQuery
operation.description: Executes a query against a Sharepoint list and returns list items that match the specified criteria

parameter.name: query
parameter.description: Query in the format listId?queryString

parameter.name: retrieveReferences
parameter.description: Retrieve full objects for reference fields (note: large lists with many reference fields may take a long time to retrieve)

parameter.name: streamingStrategy
parameter.description: Configure if repeatable streams should be used and their behaviour

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: listItemUpdate
operation.description: Updates an Item from a Sharepoint list

parameter.name: listId
parameter.description: (Mandatory) Id of the list where to update the Item

parameter.name: itemId
parameter.description: (Mandatory) Id of the item to update

parameter.name: updatedProperties
parameter.description: (Mandatory) Item properties to update

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: listUpdate
operation.description: Updates the specified properties of a Sharepoint lists

parameter.name: listId
parameter.description: (Mandatory) Id of the list to update

parameter.name: list
parameter.description: (Mandatory) List Properties to update

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: resolveCollection
operation.description: Executes an HTTP GET against the Sharepoint API.

parameter.name: url
parameter.description: (Mandatory) The absolute or relative url to get.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: resolveObject
operation.description: Executes an HTTP GET against the Sharepoint API (POST if body is blob).

parameter.name: url
parameter.description: (Mandatory) The absolute or relative url to get.

parameter.name: resolveRequestType
parameter.description: The request type to be sent.

parameter.name: body
parameter.description: Body of the request to send. 'null' if empty request body.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: resolveCollection
operation.description: Executes an HTTP GET against the Sharepoint API.

parameter.name: url
parameter.description: (Mandatory) The absolute or relative url to get.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

operation.name: resolveObject
operation.description: Executes an HTTP GET against the Sharepoint API (POST if body is blob).

parameter.name: url
parameter.description: (Mandatory) The absolute or relative url to get.

parameter.name: resolveRequestType
parameter.description: The request type to be sent.

parameter.name: body
parameter.description: Body of the request to send. 'null' if empty request body.

parameter.name: target
parameter.description: The name of a variable on which the operation's output will be placed

parameter.name: targetValue
parameter.description: An expression that will be evaluated against the operation's output and the outcome of that expression will be stored in the target variable

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

parameter.name: objectType
parameter.description: The type of objects to listen for

parameter.name: listId
parameter.description: This optional field is used only when listening for newly created list items

parameter.name: recursive
parameter.description: This optional field is used only when listening for created files or folders

parameter.name: path
parameter.description: Optional parameter used for FOLDER and FILE object types, that specifies the base path to start looking at

parameter.name: primaryNodeOnly
parameter.description: Whether this source should only be executed on the primary node when runnning in Cluster

parameter.name: schedulingStrategy
parameter.description: Configures the scheduler that triggers the polling

parameter.name: redeliveryPolicy
parameter.description: Defines a policy for processing the redelivery of the same message

parameter.name: reconnectionStrategy
parameter.description: A retry strategy in case of connectivity errors

parameter.description: Whether this source should only be executed on the primary node when runnning in Cluster
